channel.title: NYS:F on 无关紧要的宇宙
channel.description: Recent content in NYS:F on 无关紧要的宇宙

item.title: Ford May Cut About 9% of Jobs at Two South African Plants
item.description: Ford Motor Co. plans to cut more than 470 jobs at two plants in South Africa, just as imports of cars from India and China jump.
